posts.title: Is your Paynow integration failing? Here is how to fix it
posts.summary: Sometimes your integration may not always work out of the box. Here are some tips to help you fix it.

posts.title: Paynow Integration Part 5a - Checking for payments
posts.summary: If you don't check and verify your payments your customers can buy things for free from you.(PHP)

posts.title: Paynow Integration Part 4a - PHP Integration
posts.summary: So we have finished the boring part now lets integrate Paynow into our project(PHP).

posts.title: Paynow Integration Part 3 - Installation
posts.summary: After getting the keys the next stage is to install Paynow library or SDK.

posts.title: Paynow Integration Part 2 - Getting Keys
posts.summary: The first step to integrate Paynow into your app is getting keys. Without the keys you can't accept payments.

posts.title: How to be great at anything by Mark Manson
posts.summary: Sometimes your integration may not always work out of the box. Here are some tips to help you fix it.

posts.title: Paynow Integration Part 1 - Intro
posts.summary: Ever wondered how you can recieve payments on your website? Well read on to find out how you can do that  using Paynow.
